Scripts.OnClick: if this:GetChecked() then if MTShowPalette:GetChecked() then MTShowPalette:SetChecked(false) MTFramePalette:Hide() elseif MTShowSetup:GetChecked() then MTShowSetup:SetChecked(false) MTFrameTrinkets:Hide() end MTFrameAutoUse:Show() else MTFrameAutoUse:Hide() end if this:GetChecked() then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn") else PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff") end

if this:GetChecked() then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn") lblShowAutoUse:SetTextColor(1.0, 0.8196078431372, 0.0) else PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff") lblShowAutoUse:SetTextColor(0.5, 0.5, 0.5) end

if this:GetChecked() then if MTShowSetup:GetChecked() then MTShowSetup:SetChecked(false) MTFrameTrinkets:Hide() elseif MTShowAutoUse:GetChecked() then MTShowAutoUse:SetChecked(false) MTFrameAutoUse:Hide() end MTFramePalette:Show() else MTFramePalette:Hide() end if ( this:GetChecked() ) then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn"); else PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff"); end

if this:GetChecked() then if MTShowPalette:GetChecked() then MTShowPalette:SetChecked(false) MTFramePalette:Hide() elseif MTShowAutoUse:GetChecked() then MTShowAutoUse:SetChecked(false) MTFrameAutoUse:Hide() end MTFrameTrinkets:Show() else MTFrameTrinkets:Hide() end if ( this:GetChecked() ) then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn"); else PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff"); end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this,"ANCHOR_BOTTOMRIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine("Remove Trinkets that are no longer in Bags?") GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnClick: PlaySound("igMiniMapZoomIn") if MTOptionsFrame:IsVisible() then MTOptionsFrame:Hide() else MTOptionsFrame:Show() end
